title: Rahu Transit in the 10th House for Taurus Ascendant
summary: Rahu transiting the 10th house for Taurus Ascendant intensifies ambition, public visibility, and hunger for professional recognition. Career growth becomes driven by unconventional strategies, sudden opportunities, and bold image management. Desire for authority and status rises sharply, but direction may feel unstable without clear ethics. Workplace politics and power dynamics demand alert navigation. When ambition is guided by discipline and accountability, Rahu accelerates rise, enhances influence, and reshapes career trajectory through innovative yet calculated moves.

sections.heading: Career Ambition & Drive
points: Strong hunger for recognition and status
Lack of clarity can misdirect effort

closing: Rahu in the 10th house magnifies ambition and visibility. Ethical discipline transforms rapid rise into sustainable professional authority.
